hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Hi everyone! I'm Daniel, a FullStack Web Developer who lives in Santiago, Chile. Passionate about technology and always looking for new things to learn.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: These are some of the tools and technologies that I've used recently

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: These are some of the projects I've developed using technologies and tools like React, Nextjs, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, MySQL, Heroku, Vercel, Firebase, Bootstrap, among others.
